pullrequest.title: I think we are done supporting ign-transport2?

content.raw:
If I'm not wrong, gazebo7 supports ign-transport optionally.  I also don't know any other software using it.

    jrivero@nium ~ $ apt-rdepends -r libignition-transport2-dev
    Reading package lists... Done
    Building dependency tree       
    Reading state information... Done
    libignition-transport2-dev
content.html:
If I'm not wrong, gazebo7 supports ign-transport optionally. I also don't know any other software using it.
